thread.title: iOS 9.1 brings new emoji always-on Siri and Apple News to iPhones and iPads
thread.title_full: iOS 9.1 brings new emoji always-on Siri and Apple News to iPhones and iPads

title: iOS 9.1 brings new emoji always-on Siri and Apple News to iPhones and iPads
text:
iOS 9.1 brings new emoji, always-on Siri and Apple News to iPhones and iPads 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
, and Apple has now made it available to all. It's compatible with the iPhone 4S and above, iPad 2 and above, all iPad Mini models and the fifth-generation iPod Touch. 
Most notably, the update finally brings Apple News to the UK. Essentially Apple's take on Flipboard, the app allows users to create a personalised, curated news feed by selecting from a choice of topics and publications, including...
